ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Status__c)), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Final"), OR(ISBLANK(Fee__c), ISBLANK(Main_Venue__c), AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Drop In")), OR(Count_of_Estimated_Travel_Costs__c < 1, Count_of_Estimated_Venue_Costs__c < 1))), NOT($Permission.Override_Course_Validation) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To mark a course as final requires a course fee, main venue and estimated travel & venue costs if the course type isn't "Drop In". Please ensure you've completed all of these.
